issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink Phone>Play Movie>Local, I rotated to landscape mode. I noticed a white bar obscuring part of the movie. This turned out to be a notification (fully viewed by pulling down the menu from the nav bar). PLease refer to screenshot. THis did not occur with 1.6.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on Droid
2) ensure a notification is present (see additional screenshot)
3) Navigate to Phone>Play Movie>Local
4) Rotate to landscape

Result:
Notification visible

Expected Result:
Nothing but video visible

Notes:
Does not occur on 1.6.2
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink Phone>Play Movie>Local in landscape mode with notifications present shows part of notification over movie
fields.environment: Droid 1  (2.2.1), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body: This is another manifestation of redraw issues with video views in general. Will look at in 1.8 timeframe.
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
